data.author: Aleksander Szymański
data.message:
Add `leo_filters` package (#17)

* leo_filters: initial solution

* leo_filters: format all files

* leo_filters: CMakeLists.txt: removed whitespaces on line ends

* leo_filters: package.xml: update description and some minor fields

* leo_filters: complementary_filter: fix license formatting in cpp and hpp files

* leo_filters: odom_filter: remove usage of depreacted rmw struct

* leo_fw: calibrate_imu: delete all files for this functionality

* leo_fw: firmware_message_converter: remove all entities providing imu_calibration functionality

* leo_fw: package.xml: remove redundant depends

* leo_fw: firmware_message_converter: remove redundant includes

* leo_fw: CMakeLists.txt: remove redundant packages and removed scripts installation

* leo_filters: odom_filter, imu_filter: added logging info about starting the node

* leo_filters: odom_filter_parameters: remove tf_frame_prefix from parameters list

* leo_filters: odom_filter: add separate ros parameter for tf frame prefix

* leo_bringup: config: added config files with parameters for imu and odom filters

* leo_bringup: leo_bringup.launch.xml: added imu_filter and odom_filter

* leo_fw: firmware_message_converter: add tf_frame_prefix to odom frame id

* leo_filters: odom_filter: use odom_frame_id from received odom message

* leo_filters: odom_filter_parameters: remove odom_frame_id from parameters list

* leo_bringup: odom_filter.yaml: remove odom_frame_id param

* leo_filters: odom_filter: check if both imu and odom messages had been received before publishing merged_odom

* code review guidelines

* leo_filters: odom_filter_parameters: remove the file as it is redundant now

* leo_filters: CMakeLists.txt: removed installation of parameter file

* leo_filters: odom_filter: remove usage of generate parameter library and use normal param instead

* leo_filters: odom_filter: calculate time elapsed between calls instead of using constant

* Add leo_filters to dependencies

* Use std::optional for last_call_time

* leo_filters: odom_filter: remove variable initialization

* leo_filters: imu_filter: code review guidelines

* leo_filters: imu_filter: add usage of optional for time variable

* leo_filters: odom_filter: reduce number of duration conversions to seconds

* leo_filters: imu_filter: yaml save/load refactor

* leo_filters: imu_filter: fix build errors

* leo_bringup: imu_filter.yaml: update parameters and their values

* leo_filters: imu_filter: actually use SubscribtionOptions variable

* leo_bringup: imu_filter.yaml: add qos overriding parameters

* leo_filters: imu_filter: remove redundant declaration

* leo_filters: imu_filter: move function declaration before its usage

* Revert "leo_bringup: imu_filter.yaml: add qos overriding parameters"

* leo_filters: imu_filter: change qos of imu sub to default

* leo_filters: imu_filter_parameters: add brackets to validator of one param

* leo_filters: imu_filter_parameters: change int validator to bounds

* leo_bringup: leo_bringup.launch.xml: remove redundant parameter setting for odom_filter

---------

Signed-off-by: Aleksander Szymański <bitterisland6@gmail.com>
Co-authored-by: Błażej Sowa <bsowa123@gmail.com>
